title: Jasminum Sambal
Chemical Constituents: Linalool, benzyl acetate, benzyl alcohol, indole, benzyl benzoate, cis-jasmone, and trace amounts of para cresol, cis-3-hexenyl benzoate, eugenol
Therapeutic uses: Used to treat amenorrhoea, ringworm, leprosy, skin diseases and also act as an analgesic, antidepressant, anti-inflammatory, antiseptic, sedative, and expectorant.
